item.title: Diary of an app store reviewer
item.description: Gruber has written a brilliant guess at what must be going on inside the heads of the Apple App Store reviewers' mind. I specially enjoyed this nugget: I could read that over and over. Itâ€™s like the voice of a robot. The voice of authority. The voice of authoritative robots.
